short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover nonstop fun with Untabs! Play your favorite games anytime, right in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UnTabs Games & Apps — Play, Explore, Customize!

Turn your browser into a powerful and customizable hub with UnTabs Games & Apps! Enjoy a rich catalog of games and apps, all accessible directly from your new tab page, with drag-and-drop functionality and full customization options.

Key Features
🎮 Tons of Games & Apps: Play, explore, and have fun with an extensive collection of unblocked games.
🖱️ Drag & Drop Customization: Easily organize your widgets, apps, and games.
🖼️ Custom Wallpapers: Add your own PNG/JPG images as backgrounds.
🎵 Relaxing Music: Set the vibe with built-in background music.
🌤️ Weather & Clock Widgets: Stay updated with local weather and customizable time formats.
🌙 Dark Mode: Enjoy a sleek night mode for comfortable browsing.
🔗 Quick Links: Edit and access your favorite websites in one click.

Easy-to-Use Settings
Choose from 15 unique cursors.
Enable or disable widgets with one click.
Change measurement units and time formats.
Add and organize games effortlessly with drag-and-drop.
Important Information

By installing UnTabs Games & Apps, your new tab settings will be updated, and your default search provider will remain Google. You can uninstall the extension at any time.

📝 Terms of Use: https://untabs.com//terms-of-use/
🔒 Privacy Policy: https://untabs.com/privacy-policy/

Play more, customize more, and explore with UnTabs Games & Apps! 🎮
